00060 /***************************************************************************/
00067 int USBD_AbortTransfer( int epAddr )
00068 {
00069   USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback;
00070   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep = USBD_GetEpFromAddr( epAddr );
00071 
00072   if ( ep == NULL )
00073   {
00074     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_AbortTransfer(), Illegal endpoint" );
00075     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00076     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00077   }
00078 
00079   if ( ep->num == 0 )
00080   {
00081     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_AbortTransfer(), Illegal endpoint" );
00082     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00083     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00084   }
00085 
00086   INT_Disable();
00087   if ( ep->state == D_EP_IDLE )
00088   {
00089     INT_Enable();
00090     return USB_STATUS_OK;
00091   }
00092 
00093   USBD_AbortEp( ep );
00094 
00095   ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00096   if ( ep->xferCompleteCb )
00097   {
00098     callback = ep->xferCompleteCb;
00099     ep->xferCompleteCb = NULL;
00100 
00101     if ( ( dev->lastState == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED ) &&
00102          ( dev->state     == USBD_STATE_ADDRESSED  )    )
00103     {
00104       USBDHAL_DeactivateEp( ep );
00105     }
00106 
00107     DEBUG_TRACE_ABORT( USB_STATUS_EP_ABORTED );
00108     callback( USB_STATUS_EP_ABORTED, ep->xferred, ep->remaining );
00109   }
00110 
00111   INT_Enable();
00112   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00113 }

00145 /***************************************************************************/
00155 bool USBD_EpIsBusy( int epAddr )
00156 {
00157   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep = USBD_GetEpFromAddr( epAddr );
00158 
00159   if ( ep == NULL )
00160   {
00161     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_EpIsBusy(), Illegal endpoint" );
00162     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00163     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00164   }
00165 
00166   if ( ep->state == D_EP_IDLE )
00167     return false;
00168 
00169   return true;
00170 }

00184 /***************************************************************************/
00194 const char *USBD_GetUsbStateName( USBD_State_TypeDef state )
00195 {
00196   if ( state > USBD_STATE_LASTMARKER )
00197     state = USBD_STATE_LASTMARKER;
00198 
00199   return stateNames[ state ];
00200 }

00202 /***************************************************************************/
00218 int USBD_Init( const USBD_Init_TypeDef *p )
00219 {
00220   int numEps;
00221   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00222   uint8_t txFifoNum;
00223   uint8_t *conf, *confEnd;
00224   USB_EndpointDescriptor_TypeDef *epd;
00225   USB_InterfaceDescriptor_TypeDef *id;
00226   uint32_t totalRxFifoSize, totalTxFifoSize, numInEps, numOutEps;
00227 
00228 #if !defined( USB_CORECLK_HFRCO ) || !defined( CMU_OSCENCMD_USHFRCOEN )
00229   /* Devices supporting crystal-less USB can use HFRCO or HFXO as core clock. */
00230   /* All other devices must use HFXO as core clock.                           */
00231   if ( CMU_ClockSelectGet( cmuClock_HF ) != cmuSelect_HFXO )
00232   {
00233     CMU_ClockSelectSet( cmuClock_HF, cmuSelect_HFXO );
00234   }
00235 #endif
00236 
00237 #if !defined( CMU_OSCENCMD_USHFRCOEN )
00238 #if ( USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK == USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK_LFXO )
00239   CMU_OscillatorEnable(cmuOsc_LFXO, true, false);
00240 #else
00241   CMU_OscillatorEnable(cmuOsc_LFRCO, true, false);
00242 #endif
00243 
00244 #else
00245   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_CORELE, true);
00246   /* LFC clock is needed to detect USB suspend when LEMIDLE is activated. */
00247 #if ( USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK == USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK_LFXO )
00248   CMU_ClockSelectSet(cmuClock_LFC, cmuSelect_LFXO);
00249 #else
00250   CMU_ClockSelectSet(cmuClock_LFC, cmuSelect_LFRCO);
00251 #endif
00252   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_USBLE, true);
00253 #endif
00254 
00255   USBTIMER_Init();
00256 
00257   memset( dev, 0, sizeof( USBD_Device_TypeDef ) );
00258 
00259   dev->setup                = dev->setupPkt;
00260   dev->deviceDescriptor     = p->deviceDescriptor;
00261   dev->configDescriptor     = (USB_ConfigurationDescriptor_TypeDef*)
00262                               p->configDescriptor;
00263   dev->stringDescriptors    = p->stringDescriptors;
00264   dev->numberOfStrings      = p->numberOfStrings;
00265   dev->state                = USBD_STATE_LASTMARKER;
00266   dev->savedState           = USBD_STATE_NONE;
00267   dev->lastState            = USBD_STATE_NONE;
00268   dev->callbacks            = p->callbacks;
00269   dev->remoteWakeupEnabled  = false;
00270 
00271   /* Initialize EP0 */
00272 
00273   ep                 = &dev->ep[ 0 ];
00274   ep->in             = false;
00275   ep->buf            = NULL;
00276   ep->num            = 0;
00277   ep->mask           = 1;
00278   ep->addr           = 0;
00279   ep->type           = USB_EPTYPE_CTRL;
00280   ep->txFifoNum      = 0;
00281   ep->packetSize     = p->deviceDescriptor->bMaxPacketSize0;
00282 
00283   if ( ep->packetSize == 32 )
00284   {
00285     dev->ep0MpsCode = _USB_DOEP0CTL_MPS_32B;
00286   }
00287   else if ( ep->packetSize == 64 )
00288   {
00289     dev->ep0MpsCode = _USB_DOEP0CTL_MPS_64B;
00290   }
00291   else
00292   {
00293     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00294   }
00295 
00296   ep->remaining      = 0;
00297   ep->xferred        = 0;
00298   ep->state          = D_EP_IDLE;
00299   ep->xferCompleteCb = NULL;
00300   ep->fifoSize       = ep->packetSize / 4;
00301 
00302   totalTxFifoSize = ep->fifoSize * p->bufferingMultiplier[ 0 ];
00303   totalRxFifoSize = (ep->fifoSize + 1) * p->bufferingMultiplier[ 0 ];
00304 
00305 #if defined( DEBUG_USB_API )
00306   /* Do a sanity check on the configuration descriptor */
00307   {
00308     int i;
00309 
00310     /* Check if bLength's adds up exactly to wTotalLength */
00311     i = 0;
00312     conf = (uint8_t*)dev->configDescriptor;
00313     confEnd = conf + dev->configDescriptor->wTotalLength;
00314 
00315     while ( conf < confEnd )
00316     {
00317       if ( *conf == 0 )
00318         break;
00319 
00320       i += *conf;
00321       conf += *conf;
00322     }
00323 
00324     if ( ( conf != confEnd                          ) ||
00325          ( i != dev->configDescriptor->wTotalLength )    )
00326     {
00327       DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Init(), Illegal configuration descriptor" );
00328       EFM_ASSERT( false );
00329       return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00330     }
00331   }
00332 #endif /* defined( DEBUG_USB_API ) */
00333 
00334   /* Parse configuration decriptor */
00335   numEps = 0;
00336   numInEps  = 0;
00337   numOutEps = 0;
00338   conf = (uint8_t*)dev->configDescriptor;
00339   confEnd = conf + dev->configDescriptor->wTotalLength;
00340 
00341   txFifoNum = 1;
00342   while ( conf < confEnd )
00343   {
00344     if ( *conf == 0 )
00345     {
00346       DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Init(), Illegal configuration descriptor" );
00347       EFM_ASSERT( false );
00348       return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00349     }
00350 
00351     if ( *(conf + 1) == USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR )
00352     {
00353       numEps++;
00354       epd = (USB_EndpointDescriptor_TypeDef*)conf;
00355 
00356 #if defined( __GNUC__ )
00357 #pragma GCC diagnostic push
00358 #pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Warray-bounds"
00359 #endif
00360       ep                 = &dev->ep[ numEps ];
00361 #if defined( __GNUC__ )
00362 #pragma GCC diagnostic pop
00363 #endif
00364 
00365       ep->in             = ( epd->bEndpointAddress & USB_SETUP_DIR_MASK ) != 0;
00366       ep->buf            = NULL;
00367       ep->addr           = epd->bEndpointAddress;
00368       ep->num            = ep->addr & USB_EPNUM_MASK;
00369       ep->mask           = 1 << ep->num;
00370       ep->type           = epd->bmAttributes & CONFIG_DESC_BM_TRANSFERTYPE;
00371       ep->packetSize     = epd->wMaxPacketSize;
00372       ep->remaining      = 0;
00373       ep->xferred        = 0;
00374       ep->state          = D_EP_IDLE;
00375       ep->xferCompleteCb = NULL;
00376 
00377       if ( p->bufferingMultiplier[ numEps ] == 0 )
00378       {
00379         DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Init(), Illegal EP fifo buffer configuration" );
00380         EFM_ASSERT( false );
00381         return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00382       }
00383 
00384       if ( ep->in )
00385       {
00386         numInEps++;
00387         ep->txFifoNum = txFifoNum++;
00388         ep->fifoSize = ( ( ep->packetSize + 3 ) / 4 )
00389                        * p->bufferingMultiplier[ numEps ];
00390         dev->inEpAddr2EpIndex[ ep->num ] = numEps;
00391         totalTxFifoSize += ep->fifoSize;
00392         if ( ep->num > MAX_NUM_IN_EPS )
00393         {
00394           DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Init(), Illegal IN EP address" );
00395           EFM_ASSERT( false );
00396           return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00397         }
00398       }
00399       else
00400       {
00401         numOutEps++;
00402         ep->fifoSize = ( ( ( ep->packetSize + 3 ) / 4 ) + 1 )
00403                        * p->bufferingMultiplier[ numEps ];
00404         dev->outEpAddr2EpIndex[ ep->num ] = numEps;
00405         totalRxFifoSize += ep->fifoSize;
00406         if ( ep->num > MAX_NUM_OUT_EPS )
00407         {
00408           DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Init(), Illegal OUT EP address" );
00409           EFM_ASSERT( false );
00410           return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00411         }
00412       }
00413     }
00414     else if ( *(conf + 1) == USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR )
00415     {
00416       id = (USB_InterfaceDescriptor_TypeDef*)conf;
00417 
00418       if ( id->bAlternateSetting == 0 )     // Only check default interfaces
00419       {
00420         if ( dev->numberOfInterfaces != id->bInterfaceNumber )
00421         {
00422           DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Init(), Illegal interface number" );
00423           EFM_ASSERT( false );
00424           return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00425         }
00426       dev->numberOfInterfaces++;
00427       }
00428     }
00429 
00430     conf += *conf;
00431   }
00432 
00433   /* Rx-FIFO size: SETUP packets : 4*n + 6    n=#CTRL EP's
00434    *               GOTNAK        : 1
00435    *               Status info   : 2*n        n=#OUT EP's (EP0 included) in HW
00436    */
00437   totalRxFifoSize += 10 + 1 + ( 2 * (MAX_NUM_OUT_EPS + 1) );
00438 
00439   if ( dev->configDescriptor->bNumInterfaces != dev->numberOfInterfaces )
00440   {
00441     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Init(), Illegal interface count" );
00442     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00443     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00444   }
00445 
00446   if ( numEps != NUM_EP_USED )
00447   {
00448     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Init(), Illegal EP count" );
00449     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00450     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00451   }
00452 
00453   if ( numInEps > MAX_NUM_IN_EPS )
00454   {
00455     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Init(), Illegal IN EP count" );
00456     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00457     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00458   }
00459 
00460   if ( numOutEps > MAX_NUM_OUT_EPS )
00461   {
00462     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Init(), Illegal OUT EP count" );
00463     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00464     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00465   }
00466 
00467   INT_Disable();
00468 
00469   /* Enable USB clock */
00470   CMU->HFCORECLKEN0 |= CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USB | CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USBC;
00471 
00472 #if defined( CMU_OSCENCMD_USHFRCOEN )
00473   CMU->USHFRCOCONF = CMU_USHFRCOCONF_BAND_48MHZ;
00474   CMU_ClockSelectSet( cmuClock_USBC, cmuSelect_USHFRCO );
00475 
00476   /* Enable USHFRCO Clock Recovery mode. */
00477   CMU->USBCRCTRL |= CMU_USBCRCTRL_EN;
00478 
00479   /* Turn on Low Energy Mode (LEM) features. */
00480   USB->CTRL = USB_CTRL_LEMOSCCTRL_GATE
00481               | USB_CTRL_LEMIDLEEN
00482               | USB_CTRL_LEMPHYCTRL;
00483 #else
00484   CMU_ClockSelectSet( cmuClock_USBC, cmuSelect_HFCLK );
00485 #endif
00486 
00487   USBHAL_DisableGlobalInt();
00488 
00489   if ( USBDHAL_CoreInit( totalRxFifoSize, totalTxFifoSize ) == USB_STATUS_OK )
00490   {
00491     USBDHAL_EnableUsbResetAndSuspendInt();
00492     USBHAL_EnableGlobalInt();
00493     NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00494     NVIC_EnableIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00495   }
00496   else
00497   {
00498     INT_Enable();
00499     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Init(), FIFO setup error" );
00500     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00501     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00502   }
00503 
00504 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE & USB_PWRSAVE_MODE_ONVBUSOFF )
00505   if ( USBHAL_VbusIsOn() )
00506   {
00507     USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_POWERED );
00508   }
00509   else
00510 #endif
00511   {
00512     USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_NONE );
00513   }
00514 
00515   INT_Enable();
00516   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00517 }
00518 
00519 /***************************************************************************/
00545 int USBD_Read( int epAddr, void *data, int byteCount,
00546                USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback )
00547 {
00548   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep = USBD_GetEpFromAddr( epAddr );
00549 
00550   if ( ep == NULL )
00551   {
00552     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Read(), Illegal endpoint" );
00553     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00554     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00555   }
00556 
00557   if ( (   byteCount > MAX_XFER_LEN                           ) ||
00558        ( ( byteCount / ep->packetSize ) > MAX_PACKETS_PR_XFER )    )
00559   {
00560     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Read(), Illegal transfer size" );
00561     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00562     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00563   }
00564 
00565   if ( (uint32_t)data & 3 )
00566   {
00567     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Read(), Misaligned data buffer" );
00568     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00569     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00570   }
00571 
00572   INT_Disable();
00573   if ( USBDHAL_EpIsStalled( ep ) )
00574   {
00575     INT_Enable();
00576     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Read(), Endpoint is halted" );
00577     return USB_STATUS_EP_STALLED;
00578   }
00579 
00580   if ( ep->state != D_EP_IDLE )
00581   {
00582     INT_Enable();
00583     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Read(), Endpoint is busy" );
00584     return USB_STATUS_EP_BUSY;
00585   }
00586 
00587   if ( ( ep->num > 0 ) && ( USBD_GetUsbState() != USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED ) )
00588   {
00589     INT_Enable();
00590     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Read(), Device not configured" );
00591     return USB_STATUS_DEVICE_UNCONFIGURED;
00592   }
00593 
00594   ep->buf       = (uint8_t*)data;
00595   ep->remaining = byteCount;
00596   ep->xferred   = 0;
00597 
00598   if ( ep->num == 0 )
00599   {
00600     ep->in = false;
00601   }
00602   else if ( ep->in != false )
00603   {
00604     INT_Enable();
00605     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Read(), Illegal EP direction" );
00606     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00607     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00608   }
00609 
00610   ep->state          = D_EP_RECEIVING;
00611   ep->xferCompleteCb = callback;
00612 
00613   USBD_ArmEp( ep );
00614   INT_Enable();
00615   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00616 }
00617 
00618 /***************************************************************************/
00631 int USBD_RemoteWakeup( void )
00632 {
00633   INT_Disable();
00634 
00635   if ( ( dev->state != USBD_STATE_SUSPENDED ) ||
00636        ( dev->remoteWakeupEnabled == false  )    )
00637   {
00638     INT_Enable();
00639     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_RemoteWakeup(), Illegal remote wakeup" );
00640     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00641   }
00642 
00643   USBDHAL_SetRemoteWakeup();
00644   INT_Enable();
00645   USBTIMER_DelayMs( 10 );
00646   INT_Disable();
00647   USBDHAL_ClearRemoteWakeup();
00648   INT_Enable();
00649   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00650 }

00652 /***************************************************************************/
00665 bool USBD_SafeToEnterEM2( void )
00666 {
00667 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE )
00668   return USBD_poweredDown ? true : false;
00669 #else
00670   return false;
00671 #endif
00672 }
00673 
00676 void USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_State_TypeDef newState )
00677 {
00678   USBD_State_TypeDef currentState;
00679 
00680   currentState = dev->state;
00681   if ( newState == USBD_STATE_SUSPENDED )
00682   {
00683     dev->savedState = currentState;
00684   }
00685 
00686   dev->lastState = dev->state;
00687   dev->state = newState;
00688 
00689   if ( ( dev->callbacks->usbStateChange ) &&
00690        ( currentState != newState       )    )
00691   {
00692     dev->callbacks->usbStateChange( currentState, newState );
00693   }
00694 }

00698 /***************************************************************************/
00708 int USBD_StallEp( int epAddr )
00709 {
00710   USB_Status_TypeDef retVal;
00711   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep = USBD_GetEpFromAddr( epAddr );
00712 
00713   if ( ep == NULL )
00714   {
00715     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_StallEp(), Illegal request" );
00716     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00717     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00718   }
00719 
00720   if ( ep->num == 0 )
00721   {
00722     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_StallEp(), Illegal endpoint" );
00723     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00724     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00725   }
00726 
00727   INT_Disable();
00728   retVal = USBDHAL_StallEp( ep );
00729   INT_Enable();
00730 
00731   if ( retVal != USB_STATUS_OK )
00732   {
00733     retVal = USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00734   }
00735 
00736   return retVal;
00737 }
00738 
00739 /***************************************************************************/
00747 void USBD_Stop( void )
00748 {
00749   USBD_Disconnect();
00750   NVIC_DisableIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00751   USBHAL_DisableGlobalInt();
00752   USBHAL_DisableUsbInt();
00753   USBHAL_DisablePhyPins();
00754   USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_NONE );
00755   /* Turn off USB clocks. */
00756   CMU->HFCORECLKEN0 &= ~(CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USB | CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USBC);
00757 }
00758 
00759 /***************************************************************************/
00769 int USBD_UnStallEp( int epAddr )
00770 {
00771   USB_Status_TypeDef retVal;
00772   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep = USBD_GetEpFromAddr( epAddr );
00773 
00774   if ( ep == NULL )
00775   {
00776     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_UnStallEp(), Illegal request" );
00777     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00778     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00779   }
00780 
00781   if ( ep->num == 0 )
00782   {
00783     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_UnStallEp(), Illegal endpoint" );
00784     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00785     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00786   }
00787 
00788   INT_Disable();
00789   retVal = USBDHAL_UnStallEp( ep );
00790   INT_Enable();
00791 
00792   if ( retVal != USB_STATUS_OK )
00793   {
00794     retVal = USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00795   }
00796 
00797   return retVal;
00798 }

00800 /***************************************************************************/
00820 int USBD_Write( int epAddr, void *data, int byteCount,
00821                 USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback )
00822 {
00823   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep = USBD_GetEpFromAddr( epAddr );
00824 
00825   if ( ep == NULL )
00826   {
00827     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Write(), Illegal endpoint" );
00828     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00829     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00830   }
00831 
00832   if ( (   byteCount > MAX_XFER_LEN                           ) ||
00833        ( ( byteCount / ep->packetSize ) > MAX_PACKETS_PR_XFER )    )
00834   {
00835     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Write(), Illegal transfer size" );
00836     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00837     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00838   }
00839 
00840   if ( (uint32_t)data & 3 )
00841   {
00842     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Write(), Misaligned data buffer" );
00843     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00844     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00845   }
00846 
00847   INT_Disable();
00848   if ( USBDHAL_EpIsStalled( ep ) )
00849   {
00850     INT_Enable();
00851     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Write(), Endpoint is halted" );
00852     return USB_STATUS_EP_STALLED;
00853   }
00854 
00855   if ( ep->state != D_EP_IDLE )
00856   {
00857     INT_Enable();
00858     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Write(), Endpoint is busy" );
00859     return USB_STATUS_EP_BUSY;
00860   }
00861 
00862   if ( ( ep->num > 0 ) && ( USBD_GetUsbState() != USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED ) )
00863   {
00864     INT_Enable();
00865     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Write(), Device not configured" );
00866     return USB_STATUS_DEVICE_UNCONFIGURED;
00867   }
00868 
00869   ep->buf       = (uint8_t*)data;
00870   ep->remaining = byteCount;
00871   ep->xferred   = 0;
00872 
00873   if ( ep->num == 0 )
00874   {
00875     ep->in = true;
00876   }
00877   else if ( ep->in != true )
00878   {
00879     INT_Enable();
00880     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBD_Write(), Illegal EP direction" );
00881     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00882     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00883   }
00884 
00885   ep->state          = D_EP_TRANSMITTING;
00886   ep->xferCompleteCb = callback;
00887 
00888   USBD_ArmEp( ep );
00889   INT_Enable();
00890   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00891 }
00892 
00893 /******** THE REST OF THE FILE IS DOCUMENTATION ONLY !**********************/
01391 #endif /* defined( USB_DEVICE ) */
01392 #endif /* defined( USB_PRESENT ) && ( USB_COUNT == 1 ) */
